Description:
HOME IS WHERE YOUR STORY BEGINS
Just one look is all you will need for this neat, sweet and complete home in Kangaroo Flat.
It's impeccably presented - just move in and enjoy the two good-sized bedrooms, main with walk-in-robe/dressing room, a spacious lounge and bright kitchen with gas cooking and ample cabinetry including island bench. Extra living spaces include the fully enclosed front porch creating the ideal sunroom where you can sit and soak up the morning sun filtering through Venetian blinds plus a dining/sitting room opening to a rear paved outdoor entertaining area underneath a wisteria-draped pergola.
The bathroom and internal WC are located off the main hallway while all floor and window coverings are in top condition while gas heating and split system air conditioning ensure year-round comfort.
The fully-fenced large block (approx 1040m²) includes a 6m x 3m workshop, sundry shedding and gated single carport with plenty of room for further shedding etc. if desired.
This cheerful and bright home would be a great investment property or first home - a short stroll will have you in the Kangaroo Flat shopping centre for a coffee or walk the children to the nearby schools, bus stop or playground.
Well maintained, affordable brick homes are hard to find, so if you're in the market for your first, last or investment property, you should check this one out.
Insights: 13 Olympic Parade, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Convenience, Lifestyle
Downsize in the safe and secure surroundings of this lovely two bedroom unit. Located in Rosedale Village, Kangaroo Flat, it offers you affordable living at its best with all the independence you need.
The unit features two bedrooms with robes, spacious open lounge, dining and kitchen equipped with electric upright stove, good storage with pantry, ample cupboards with island bench/breakfast bar separating it from the dining area. Lounge has a gas heater plus fuss-free split system heating /cooling in the dining area meaning comfort all year round. Both bedrooms include built-in-robes, good size bathroom with large shower, separate toilet and laundry.
Outside, the carport has room for one car plus the other half of the carport can be used as a delightful, sheltered outdoor living area if you desired. It comes with a garden shed to store those extra bits and pieces. Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle. Call today for your private inspection - contact Kaylene Disher on 0431 039 512.

Description:
2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Low Maintenance Living!
This stunning neat 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom town house is perfect for anyone looking for low maintenance living with the ability to cater for a guest or room mate. Main bedroom features ensuite & walk in robe, second bedroom offers built in robes and use of second main bathroom. The property features reverse cycle split air-conditioning, ceiling fans, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, formal lounge and open plan kitchen/meals area. Outside includes a single lock-up garage with remote door, covered pergola area and low maintenance garden. Ideal for the downsizer, first homebuyer or single looking for easy care low maintenance living. For the investor currently let at $290pw to excellent tenants. Close to schools, shopping and transport and on the Melbourne side of Bendigo for the commuters.

Description:
Lifestyle and Luxury.
This elegant and contemporary style home is your family's slice of luxury.
Set in a quiet yet central nook of Kangaroo Flat set back off Mitchell Street and right around the corner from all the main stores and amenities this beautifully constructed home combines comfort, practicality, natural light and polished modern aesthetics.
The master suite at the front of the home invites relaxation with its walk-in robe, views of the front yard and ensuite with large shower, vanity and striking subway tiling.
It's the family chef's dream gourmet kitchen boasting large window views, black and white colour palette, quality appliances, feature island breakfast bench, decorative pendant lights and grand walk-in pantry.
The open style living and dining area overlooks the home's landscaped backyard and large entertaining area, providing the ideal space to gather with friends and family.
Ceiling fans in the bedrooms, split system in the living, and ducted heating and cooling throughout provide ease of living all year round.
A double lock up garage, additional powered and concreted 5m x 6m shed, garden shed, established garden beds and modern front facade adds to the outdoor features.
Complimenting the appeal of this home is its idyllic quiet location; an easy 1.5 hour commute to Melbourne or a short walk to Gurri Wanyarra via the Bendigo Creek Tail.
It also boasts ease of living with its access to Kangaroo Flats amenities and shops either side; the main street in one direction and popular Lansell Square just over 1km the other.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes for your private inspection.
Insights: 32 Grantham Terrace, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique and delightful home with period features
- Centrally located is this lovely five bedroom home on 825m2 also offering three living areas
- Separate self-contained bungalow/studio (2 rooms) offering versatility
- Renovated home with new kitchen, bathroom, freshly painted and stunningly presented
- Beautiful inground pool (solar heated) off the master bedroom, decking and water feature
- Amazingly presented with very nice period features - you'll love it
- All large bedrooms, master with ensuite and french doors to the pool
- Lounge, dining, sunroom, modern kitchen, bungalow, polished timber floors, all new blinds etc
- A very unique and impressive home for any family and in a great locale
- Offering 5 bedrooms and three bathrooms - great for any family
- Call Gavin on 0427 887 766 for an inspection Monday to Sunday
This extremely versatile home offers options for many, whether it be the growing family or those wanting an external studio/office close to their accommodation quarters. The home has been very nicely renovated and has some delightful features including the inground pool which the children will love. The studio is excellent and set up with its own yard and is also very well presented.

Description:
Rosedale Residential Village
Located a short stroll to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, this secure home has all the modern cons and the bonus of a shaded private outdoor area. Entering from the front porch you are greeted with an open plan lounge /dining area that adjoins the kitchen with good storage space and full cooking facilities. Both bedrooms have built-in robes and close by is the bathroom that features a large shower, vanity and separate toilet. This home has reverse cycle heating /cooling with undercover parking for one car and with a smartly built in garden shed, there is room for additional storage of those bulky items. Inspect this property now - contact Kaylene Disher on 0431 039 512.

Address: Lot 5 Cannon Lane Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Can you find a larger allotment?
Located with peace and quiet in mind, this large allotment of 805 sq metres has a fantastic outlook. Build your dream home on an affordable allotment with all serviced available. Close to Lansell Plaza Shopping Centre and public transport, this allotment is perfect for the purchaser seeking a low maintenance home site. A frontage of 16.00 metres to Cannon Lane and a depth of 50.29 metres, bring the caravan, trailer and boat.
- Either commute to Melbourne in 90 minutes or jump on the train at the Kangaroo Flat train station, the options are there
- A great lifestyle is on offer with walking tracks around both Crusoe and No.7 Reservoir a lovely stroll away
- This affordable block is one you should not miss out on
- Titles have been issued and ready for you to construct your new home
- All services available
- Fully Fenced
- Lot 5 - 805m2

Description:
Spacious & Scenic Living on Large 1543m2 Allotment
After over 40 years of precious memories, and being built and tightly held by the same family, this affordable and spacious brick veneer residence is now ready for a lucky new owner to call this property their own.
Comprises an adaptable floor plan including 3 bedrooms, study (or 4th bedroom), open plan kitchen/meals and living area, plus a large separate formal lounge.
Main bathroom includes shower, bath and vanity, plus a very useful second shower is located in the laundry.
Ducted evaporative cooling and gas heating ensure year-round comfort.
Substantial 1543m2 allotment is ideal for kids, pets and families to enjoy and the adjoining bush reserve provides a beautiful serene environment.
7.5m x 5.5m shed plus additional sundry shedding. An abundance of space for trailers, caravans, boats and equipment.
Rarely do you get an opportunity to secure a property with so many appealing features in such an enticing price range. The added bonus of a convenient lifestyle is also on hand with easy access to local shopping, schools, recreation, and medical facilities.
*Contact Bawa on 0402 206 745 to arrange a private inspection as there will not be any open for inspections due to current regulations.

Address: 7 The Winding Way Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Private and secluded family home on an acre with a pool
Nestled amongst the trees sitting on just over an acre is this solid 4 bedroom family home.
This property has so much to offer being so close to all the shops, schools and Melbourne end of Kangaroo Flat.
As soon as you arrive, take in the tree line surrounds and privacy.
Walking down the drive, the pool and outdoor area will catch your eye. The home has a sense of space with the 9ft ceilings, open-plan kitchen and dining with separate family room and lounge with study nook.
For all the seasonal comforts, the home has evaporative cooling and ducted heating plus reverse-cycle spilt-system in the massive family room and solid fuel heater in the lounge.
Recently updated large kitchen with gas cooktop, breakfast bar, wall oven and loads of cabinets for storage.
The hub of the home is in the perfect position for entertaining out at the pergola and pool area.
The 4 bedrooms are down the hall at the back of the house, the master bedroom with walk-in robe and 3 piece ensuite, taking in the breathtaking views of outside.
The other 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and also take in the tree line views of the property, and are all serviced by the 3-piece main bathroom off the hall.
It's the outdoor living that makes this home a one-of-a-kind with a deck at the front of the home, and a covered outdoor area with BBQ nook and fenced pool area.
Down the drive is a double lock-up shed with electric roller door and 14 double power points, plus another 2 car spaces at the front of the house.
Other extras on the property are 5.2kW solar, 44,000 litre water tanks, garden shed, and the huge bonus of all services connected at this property.
This is a must see, it's not very often these amazing secluded properties come on the market, within minutes to everything that Kangaroo Flat has to offer.

Address: 7 The Winding Way Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Private and secluded family home on an acre with a pool
Nestled amongst the trees sitting on just over an acre is this solid 4 bedroom family home.
This property has so much to offer being so close to all the shops, schools and Melbourne end of Kangaroo Flat.
As soon as you arrive, take in the tree line surrounds and privacy.
Walking down the drive, the pool and outdoor area will catch your eye. The home has a sense of space with the 9ft ceilings, open-plan kitchen and dining with separate family room and lounge with study nook.
For all the seasonal comforts, the home has evaporative cooling and ducted heating plus reverse-cycle spilt-system in the massive family room and solid fuel heater in the lounge.
Recently updated large kitchen with gas cooktop, breakfast bar, wall oven and loads of cabinets for storage.
The hub of the home is in the perfect position for entertaining out at the pergola and pool area.
The 4 bedrooms are down the hall at the back of the house, the master bedroom with walk-in robe and 3 piece ensuite, taking in the breathtaking views of outside.
The other 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and also take in the tree line views of the property, and are all serviced by the 3-piece main bathroom off the hall.
It's the outdoor living that makes this home a one-of-a-kind with a deck at the front of the home, and a covered outdoor area with BBQ nook and fenced pool area.
Down the drive is a double lock-up shed with electric roller door and 14 double power points, plus another 2 car spaces at the front of the house.
Other extras on the property are 5.2kW solar, 44,000 litre water tanks, garden shed, and the huge bonus of all services connected at this property.
This is a must see, it's not very often these amazing secluded properties come on the market, within minutes to everything that Kangaroo Flat has to offer.
Insights: 7 The Winding Way, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Superb Home in Convenient Location
Positioned in the heart of Kangaroo Flat in a quiet court, this three-bedroom home is move in ready. Close to all Kangaroo Flat amenities and less than 2kms from the Rocklea Homemaker Centre and Lansell Square, and only a short walk or drive to Kangaroo Flat Train Station.
The property features include:
Three great bedrooms, main with built in robe
Open plan kitchen and meals area with space for a breakfast bar
Ample kitchen storage with dishwasher and gas cooktop
Large lounge area with additional study nook or sunroom/sitting area
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout, instant gas hot water
Large shed 7.6 x 4.3m (approx.) with an allocated space for a home office or extra storage
Secure back yard with garden shed, established gardens and lawn with sprinkler system
Aluminium cladding over weatherboards, great for long term and low maintenance
Large dog run or chicken pen, plus secure dog kennel
Great summer barbeques on the decked patio area, while the kids play in the backyard. This is a chance to secure a great home at an affordable price, be quick to contact the Heard & Co. Sales Team to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Renovated Home on Big Block!
Positioned just a hop skip and a jump from popular Lansell Shopping Centre and just a short distance further into the centre of Bendigo, a hub of cosmopolitan delights including the fine Restaurants, Wine bars and of course our famous Art Gallery.
This charming renovated three-bedroom home sits on a big 777m² block and features a crystal blue above-ground pool, an undercover entertaining area, a shed/workshop, 2 car space garage plus room for your caravan or trailer, as well as 8-panel solar system, just to name a few of these wonderful features.
Internally you are greeted with a spacious light-filled living room, which you will love sitting by the warm ambience of the gas log fireplace in the winter or equally comfortable in the summertime with the split system cooling unit. This leads to the open plan dining and kitchen zone. The kitchen has ample room to impress people who love cooking, plenty of cabinetry for storage and loads of bench space to prepare meals. Additionally, the kitchen comes with an 800mm stainless steel Smeg oven!
Accommodation comprises of three good size bedrooms, all with built-in robes and split system units. A character-filled bathroom comes with a free-standing bathtub, shower and vanity.
This family filled street is so quiet you wouldn't know you were just 10 minutes into the heart of Bendigo's hustle and bustle.
Absolutely everything has been thought of so you can simply move in and enjoy!
**In response to the recent events, with the precautions our agents have in place, we are able to hold private inspections. If you would like to schedule a private inspection please contact our agents. We also have 3D tours of all of our properties as well as videos. **
Insights: 11 Morrison Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal Downsizer, Investment or First Home!
Well presented this 3 bedroom townhouse offers the opportunity to downsize with the benefits good size living space and a mid size, low maintenance garden. If you also own a caravan there is also a couple of zones where you can park it. The home includes a walk in robe to the main, built in robes to the other bedrooms, 2 way 3 piece bathroom, and large open plan kitchen/meals living. Other features include reverse cycle split air-conditioning plus a cosy gas log fire. Outside includes a double garage with remote door, plus a handy rear roller door, ideal for bringing the caravan or trailer through to the back yard; and there is also internal access into the home. The backyard includes a large covered pergola with access from the kitchen/meals area, and at the front of the home there is a dedicated area to store the caravan as well. The property also includes a cost saving solar system. Situated in Kangaroo Flat on the Melbourne side of Bendigo and close to schools, shopping and transport. Reside or invest, this home is move in ready and will suit a multitude of buyers!

Description:

This low maintenance three-bedroom villa in the Aviva Communities Village offers independent pet-friendly living and the opportunity to downsize and either stay active or put the feet up.
Offering spacious open plan kitchen/dining/lounge with large kitchen bench, electric oven and gas hotplates, split-system heating/cooling, built-in robes in all bedrooms (third bedroom could become a study/craft room), double linen, private access to your own carport, undercover alfresco area and garden shed, while the rear yard provides ample room for your vegetable garden.
The village features bowling green, community centre, gym, hair salon, bar, theatre and heated swimming pool all for your entertainment and convenience. All this with only a short walk to bus stop and Lansell Square shopping.

Description:
Affordable Townhouse close to Local Amenities
Sitting proudly on an elevated 314m2, is this solid brick renovated townhouse with fabulous views.
With its large windows, split-level and unique architecture, this home certainly has character and charm.
The lower level is open plan and incorporates a bright and airy kitchen with a 900mm stove, pantry and plenty of cupboards, whilst the lounge area is spacious and opens out to a sunny private courtyard.
The upper level consists of 2 bedrooms, both with built in robes and a split system to the main bedroom, plus a fully renovated bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Other features include heating and cooling in the lounge ensuring year-round comfort. Outside is a great alfresco area with room for pets, herb garden or veggie patch, as well as a garden shed with concrete floor.
Situated in a quiet court, on its own title with no body corp, this property would be ideal for a first homebuyer or investor, with a current rental appraisal of potentially $260 per week.
Certainly worth an inspection.

Description:
New modern house - close to everything!
Attention! First home buyers, Down sizers and Investors this exciting new modern B/V low maintenance house has it all, with a great location and room to fit a caravan, boat, trailer or the lot!! What a bonus!
With open plan living contains an extra large shower in the master ensuite with walk in robe and built-ins in bedrooms 2 and 3. A modern kitchen with handy double pull out bin drawer for extra tidyness, walk in pantry and split system heating/cooling for full comfort. Modern pendant lighting over island bench and d/lights to match, all is covered here with attention to detail. 2 TV aerial inputs on walls for neatness, internal double garage for added convenience, this townhouse is sure to please, get your skates on call us now!
